questions.text: During the task, to what extent have you felt that things were NOT going your way in the task?
questions.description: Distress (1 = never, 7 = very often)

questions.text: During the task, to what extent have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in the task?
questions.description: Distress (1 = never, 7 = very often)

questions.text: During the task, to what extent have you felt difficulties at your task were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?
questions.description: Distress (1 = never, 7 = very often)

questions.text: During the task, to what extent have you felt unconfident about your ability to handle the task problems?
questions.description: Distress (1 = never, 7 = very often)

questions.text: How often can you easily understand the tickets you work with?
questions.description: Cognitive Load (1 = never, 7 = very often)

questions.text: In general, the processes I need to follow to do my work are easy for me to figure out.
questions.description: Cognitive Load (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: In general, the system I have is intuitive and easy to use.
questions.description: Cognitive Load (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: To complete the task, using this system was very frustrating.
questions.description: Cognitive Effort (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: To complete the task, using this system required too much effort.
questions.description: Cognitive Effort (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: To complete the task, using this system took too much time.
questions.description: Cognitive Effort (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: To complete the task, using this system was too complex.
questions.description: Cognitive Effort (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: Please reflect on your decision after the task. My decision was precise.

questions.text: Please reflect on your decision after the task. My decision was error-free.

questions.text: Please reflect on your decision after the task. My decision was flawless.
questions.description: Perceived Decision Quality (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: I have no doubt my estimates are close to the true values.
questions.description: Self-Confidence (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: I am sure I am performing well on this task.
questions.description: Self-Confidence (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: I think my initial estimates are accurate.

questions.text: I Strongly trust the system.

questions.text: If someone opposes me, I can find the ways and means to get what I want.
questions.description: Perceived Self-Efficacy (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)

questions.text: I am certain that I can accomplish my goals.

questions.text: I can handle whatever comes my way.
